description:
Simple helper class used for holding arguments.

Although PingArgumentParser will guarantee that our dictionary has the
same keys in the right format as our attributes below, using a Pydantic
model adds an extra layer of safety in case something *does* go wrong
somewhere.

message.description: Extra message to include in the ping response.
message.title: Message

delay.description: The number of seconds to delay the reponse for.
delay.title: Delay

ping_timestamp.description: The reference timestamp for the ping request.
ping_timestamp.title: Ping Timestamp

title: PingArguments
